text: Another Makie question: is there a method to remove all plots from an axis? I'd like to have a workflow of setting up an axis with some common properties, then plotting a few variables (line plots) with `lines!` into that axis, then possibly be able to clear the axis and plot different variables. I'm not sure how to replace the data in the plot without creating a whole new figure.

text: dont know about Makie, but for Plots you can do `p=plot(do your thing)` and then `p1=deepcopy(p)`
